intro: Aneilema pedunculosum var. luteum, commonly known as the yellow aneilema, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the Araceae family, characterized by its distinctive spatulate leaves and showy inflorescences. The plant produces yellowish-green spathes that enclose small, inconspicuous flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in humid lowland forests. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for tropical gardens and indoor cultivation.
